front.title: Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP) and Registration Data Access Protocol (RDAP) Status Mapping

abstract.t: This document describes the mapping of the Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP) statuses with the statuses registered for use in the Registration Data Access Protocol (RDAP). This document identifies gaps in the mapping, and registers RDAP statuses to fill those gaps to ensure that all of the EPP statuses specified in RFCs are supported in RDAP.
